message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product to you at a price of $20,000. I believe it offers significant value at this price point. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but $20,000 is a bit steep for me. I'd like to make a counteroffer of $17,000. Can you consider this price?
Bob, I appreciate your interest. While $20,000 represents the value I see in the product, I'm willing to come down to $18,500. I believe this is a fair compromise.
I understand your compromise, but I'm still a bit hesitant. I'd like to make another counteroffer of $16,500. Can you consider this price?
Bob, I'm trying to be flexible, but $16,500 is cutting it too close to my bottom line. I could meet you halfway at $17,500. This is my final offer.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $17,500 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $16,800. Can you consider this price?
